bibl.title: The Art of Greek Comedy.
bibl.note: A critical analysis of the comedies of Aristophanes and Menander studied in the context of the history of comedy, of the allied arts, and of contemporary life.
bibl.seg: Lever Katherine, The Art of Greek Comedy.
A critical analysis of the comedies of Aristophanes and Menander studied in the context of the history of comedy, of the allied arts, and of contemporary life.
